#### The purpose of this page is to provide the resources for the first session of our RStudio and R::packages workshop series.


* Before we begin, we need to install [R](https://www.r-project.org/) and [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/) (RStudio requires R to be installed).
    + Download R: https://ftp.osuosl.org/pub/cran/
    + Download RStudio: https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download
